I am not sure if you are aware, but it appears that iTunes only has Episodes 45 on.  A few weeks ago, all of them were available, but they seem to be disappearing...

FlagShare
LikeReply
cmaxw 5ptsmoderatorFeatured
Jan 5, 2013

@breamy The long answer is that Feedburner will only burn feeds that are smaller than 512 kB. Our feed went over that, so I had to limit the number of episodes we output to it. 

 

I'm working on finding ways of reducing the size of the rss feed per episode to get more episodes into the feed.
